definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

pinyin: Wen1 bu4 er3 deng1 Wang3 qiu2 Gong1 kai1 sai4

sentences.english: Mr. Wang Runan, chairman of China Go Association attended the contest opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 中國棋院院長王汝南出席了開賽儀式。

sentences.english: And their weapons may be blessed by a shaman.
sentences.chinese: 開賽前可以找一個薩滿爲武器祝福。

sentences.english: But the US Open tennis tournament is still set to open in New York on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 但是美國網球公開賽仍然計劃在週一在紐約開打。

sentences.english: Rafael Nadal serves to John Isner during the BNP Paribas Open in California.
sentences.chinese: 在加州法國巴黎銀行公開賽上納達爾向伊斯內爾發球。

sentences.english: June also sees the start of the Wimbledon tennis tournament.
sentences.chinese: 溫布爾登網球錦標賽也在六月開賽。

sentences.english: Sailing races are due to start on August 9, weather permitting.
sentences.chinese: 如果天氣狀況允許，奧運帆船項目將於8月9號開賽。

sentences.english: It was a fight to the finish in this year's British Open, Padraig Harrington emerging victorious after a four-hole play-off.
sentences.chinese: 本年度英國高爾夫公開賽今天結束了最後一場比賽。

sentences.english: Lorena Ochoa has won the Women's British Open.
sentences.chinese: 奧喬亞贏了英國女子高爾夫球公開賽。

sentences.english: The NBA's new season starts in October, and Yao Ming says he will be ready.
sentences.chinese: NBA十月開賽，姚明稱他將傷愈復出。

sentences.english: The Open continued to be held at Prestwick for 11 years.
sentences.chinese: 之後，公開賽在普瑞斯威科持續舉辦了11年。

sentences.english: Obafemi Martins and Alvaro Recoba have also been linked with possible moves away before the start of the new season.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁斯和雷科巴也可能在新賽季開賽之前離開。

sentences.english: All participants should register at the Registration Desk at least 15 minutes before their race time.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者必須在開賽前最少15分鐘於報到處登記。

sentences.english: I like the way Marbury, our opening bater started the game.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡我們開賽的打擊手馬布裏一開始的表現。

sentences.english: China Cup International Gymnastics Tournament opened yesterday in Beijing Capital Gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 中國杯國際體操邀請賽昨天在北京首都體育館開賽。

sentences.english: The French Open will be transmitted live via satellite.
sentences.chinese: 法國網球公開賽會透過衛星實況轉播。

sentences.english: This whole town is gearing up for Wimbledon tennis.
sentences.chinese: 整個城市都準備着迎接溫布爾登網球公開賽。
